Variable.Name: SCE_SNC_LIB_Exists
Variable.Value: NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SCE Script: Checking if environment variable SNC_LIB already exists" If NwEngine.Shell.RegValueExist("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment\SNC_LIB") Then szSNCLIB = NwEngine.Shell.GetRegValue("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Control\Session Manager\Environment\SNC_LIB") NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SCE Script: Variable SNC_LIB exists and its value is " & szSNCLIB If szSNCLIB <> "" Then NwEngine.Variables.AppendDefaultValue "SCE_SNC_LIB_Exists", szSNCLIB End If Else NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SCE Script: Variable SNC_LIB not found, will be inserted by SapSetup" End if

Variable.Name: varSapSncClientEncryptionARPVersion
Variable.Value:
Option Explicit
Dim path : path = NwEngine.Variables.ResolveString("%SapSrcDir%\%varSapSncClientEncryptionSrcDir%\cfg\sce.version") NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SCE Script: Retrieving version from " & path & " for Uninstall entry." If NwEngine.Shell.FileExist(path) Then Dim fso Dim file Dim content
Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") Set file = fso.OpenTextFile(path, 1) content = file.ReadAll Dim version version = Trim(Replace(content, vbCRLF, "")) NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SCE Script: Extracted version is: " & version NwEngine.Variables.AppendDefaultValue "varSapSncClientEncryptionARPVersion", version Else NwEngine.Context.Log.Write "SCE Script: Version file " & path & " doesn't exist." End If
